Translations.Text: Vos noted those argue deus proofs ac quam they habet deviated
They est the unus disbelieved scripture messages nos sent noster messengers. Ergo they perfecit surely invenit out
shackles est their necks chains est used to drag them
In Inferno tunc in Fire they burn
They asked Ubi est idols vos used worship
beside DEUS? They dictus They relinquit nos. In fact, when nos worshipped them nos worshipping nihil. Ergo perfecit DEUS send disbelievers astray
Hoc vos used rejoice false doctrines terra vos used promote them
Iniit gates Gehenna wherein vos abide forever Quod miserable destiny pro arrogant unus
Vos est patient deus promise est truth. Nos show vos some de (retribution) nos promised them terminate tuus vita ante ut, they returned nos

Nos sent messengers vos - some de them nos mentioned vos some nos non mention vos. Non messenger produce any miracle deus authorization Dodum deus judgment proles truth dominates falsifiers exposed humiliated
